Greetings to Czech President
articles.content:
Greetings to Czech President 
    Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a message of greetings to Vaclav Havel, President of the Czech Republic, on the occasion of the 84th anniversary of the formation of the independent state of Czechoslovakia, its national day.
 Expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow stronger in the future, too, the message sincerely wished the president and people of the Czech Republic greater success in their work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to 6th Congress of RPT
articles.content:
Greetings to 6th Congress of RPT 
    Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee today sent a message of greetings to the 6th Congress of the Revolutionary Party of Tanzania.
 The message expressed conviction that the congress would be an important occasion in the activities of the RPT for strengthening the party and building a new independent society.    
 In the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would grow stronger in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, the message wished the RPT great success in the work of the congress.

articles.title: Greetings to Turkish Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Turkish Prime Minister 
    Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to his Turkish counterpart Bulent Ecevit on the occasion of the 79th anniversary of the proclamation of the Republic of Turkey.
 The message wished him success in his work for the independent development and prosperity of the country and hoped for further development of the friendly relations between the two countries in the future.    
 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to his Turkish counterpart Sukru Sina Gurel who is also deputy Prime Minister.

articles.title: Greetings to Turkish President
articles.content:
Greetings to Turkish President 
    Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greetings to President Ahmed Necdet Sezer on the occasion of the 79th anniversary of the promulgation of the Republic of Turkey.
 In the message he expressed belief that the friendly relations existing between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, too, and wished the president and the people of Turkey success in their work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Russian delegation arrives
articles.content:
Russian delegation arrives
    Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Khabarovsk territorial government of the Russian Federation led by its deputy chairman  Alexander B. Levintal arrived here today.

articles.title: DPRK military delegation leaves for Russia
articles.content:
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- A military delegation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea led by general of the Korean People's Army Ri Myong Su left Pyongyang today to visit the Russian Federation.
 The delegation was seen off at the airport by colonel general Pak Sung Won, general officers and officers of the KPA and Russian military attache here Vladislav Prokopenko.
